text.en: To pass an exam 40% marks are essential, A obtains 10% marks less than pass marks & B obtains 11.11% marks less than A. What % less than sum of A & B marks should C obtain to pass the exam?

trick_application: A obtains 10% less than 40, so A = 36 marks.
B obtains 11(1/9)% less than A, so B = 32 marks.
C needs (68 - 40) / 68 * 100 = 41.2% less than A & B.
